EmailTemplate.subject: Show discounts and promotions for 2019
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>
BendixKing Channel Newsletter | April 2019 <[[http://www.bendixKing.com]]> Channel Partners,
BendixKing is handing out show voucher cards to consumers at these following shows:
- Sun N Fun: April 2nd - April 7th - Aero Friedrichshafen: April 10th - April 13th - AOPA Regional Fly in: May 10th & May 11th - EBACE: May 21st- May 23rd
These voucher cards will indicate a discounted amount towards BendixKing avionics to help bring customers your way. Voucher redemption and rules will be on the card itself.
In addition, for the USA shows, BendixKing with be promoting discounts through our new “My Avionics” iOS mobile app.
My Avionics <[[https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/my-avionics/id1367559967?mt=8]]> can be downloaded from the Apple iTunes store, and it’s very simple to use!
- Open the app - Upload or take a picture of your panel - Enter your email and tail number - Get a 10% discount!
Questions on the app? Send them to sales@bendixking.com <[[mailto:sales@bendixking.com]]> Attn: Steve Pearce
Contact our sales team <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/sales-team]]> or visit our current promotions <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/pages/current-promotions]]> page to find out more.
